meanings.definition: The muscles along the spine of an animal, especially a deer, used as a cut of meat.
meanings.sent1: The hunter grilled the deer backstraps for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The chef seasoned the backstraps before cooking them.
meanings.sent3: The backstraps were so tender, they practically melted in the mouth.
meanings.sent4: The sizzling aroma of the cooking backstraps filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The juicy backstraps were the highlight of the meal.

meanings.definition: The straps on the back of a backpack or other piece of equipment.
meanings.sent1: She adjusted the backstraps of her backpack for a comfortable fit.
meanings.sent2: The hiker tightened the backstraps before starting the trek.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to chew through the backpack backstraps.
meanings.sent4: The weight of the backpack felt lighter with the padded backstraps.
meanings.sent5: The colorful backstraps added a stylish touch to the backpack.
